titles: Here begynnethe a lytyll treatyse whiche is called the .xii. profytes of trybulacyon
author: Peter, of Blois, ca. 1135-ca. 1212.
publisher: In Caxtons hous. By me Wynkyn the Worde,
notes: Imprint from colophon; publication date from STC.
A translation of: Peter, of Blois.  De XII utilitatibus tribulationis.
Reproduction of the original in the John Rylands University of Manchester Library.
